title: Haunted Horror Pre-Code Cover Coloring Book Volume 1
description: Beware horror fan, for the blood-red marker is on your hands in this brand-new coloring book format for adults! Featuring pre-code comic book frights from talents like Dick Briefer, Bob Powell, Tom Sutton, Howard Nostrand and many more, this do-it-yoursself deluge of dark delights is sure to send goosebumps of tittilation and stand hairs straight on end for fans of the gruesome, gross, and macabre! With nearly 60 pages to color from the creepiest and most sordid publishers of the time!
author: Craig Yoe
